attributes.action: Get the sfa to add paul gasgoine to the sfa hall of fame
attributes.additional_details: Alot of people suffer from mental health and the sfa acting in this way is a disgrace
attributes.background: Mental health is a medical condition and punishing someone for having it is wrong , the sfa have withdrawn paul gasgoine from the hall of fame when his contribution to scottish football speaks for itself the reason they have withdrawn him is because the problems hes had due to his mental health

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of the Scottish Football Association.
